#include <iostream>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector> 
#include <limits.h>
#include <string>
#include <map>

using namespace std;

int main(){
	map<char,int> count;
	string str,resp="";
	int N,K;
	cin >> N >> K >> str;
	for(int j=0;j<K;j++){
		count['a'] = 0;count['b']=0;count['c']=0;
		for(int i=0;i<N/K;i++){
			count[str[K*i+j]]++;
		}
		if(count['a'] >= max(count['b'],count['c'])) resp+='a';
		else if(count['b'] >= count['c']) resp +='b';
		else resp+='c';
	}
	cout << resp << endl;
	return 0;
}
